name: MichaelJacksonUpdates
0:
”Alexa, open Michael Jackson updates”
”Update me on MJ”
”How is Mike Jackson doing?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: michael jackson updates
des: This skill allows Alexa to give an update on the king of pop himself! This skill informs the user on the current status of Michael Jackson: more specifically, whether or not he is still dead. Modern technology is amazing, so it is only a matter of time before deceased celebrities can be brought back to life. Be the first to know when MJ makes his return with Michael Jackson Updates. Inspired by @MJUpdatess on Twitter.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
